name: I Am Rene Judge
body:
Hi.

This is my formal resume, although I do so much more. For inquiries or to just get in touch, please contact me at rek1111@hotmail.com .

### Sales Administrator/Customer Service Representative, Arc Technologies, Amesbury, MA
July 2007- February 2010

* Inside Sales Representative for Eastern U.S. and Canada territory.
* Internal duties include pursuing Internet leads, processing sales reports, orders and quotations, and supporting field sales agents. 
* Coordinate product availability and pricing between manufacturing and customers and represent customer in production meetings. 


### Administrative Coordinator, SunGard Higher Education, Waltham, MA
November 2005-July 2007

* Assist in event planning and coordinate training and conferences for clients and staff. Tasks include troubleshooting registration issues, client support, editing presentations, and maintaining email support for event. 
* Responsible for maintenance of client databases.
* Provide support to accounting department, human resources, and the president.

### Operations Assistant, Lexia Learning Systems, Lincoln, MA
June 2005-November 2005
* Responsible for processing Internet and mail sales orders of educational software. Aid in the processing, fulfillment, and invoicing of products sold by company to schools, districts, and resellers.
* Responsibilities also include maintenance of sales database, directing customer calls and queries and tracking inventory.

### Freelance Reporter, Community Newspaper Company, Concord, MA
September 2001- June 2005
* Conduct interviews, research and attend community and sporting events for articles in several town newspapers.
* Responsible for submitting completed work on daily and weekly deadlines.

### Education
* North Reading High School, Graduate, 1998
* Bachelor of Arts in Communications, Salem State College
